snippet: An anonymous Jane Roe and a group that supports abortion rights today filed a lawsuit against four anti-abortion groups that are accused of passing themselves off as medical clinics offering abortion services.   The group, Planned Parenthood of Sa...
lead_paragraph: An anonymous Jane Roe and a group that supports abortion rights today filed a lawsuit against four anti-abortion groups that are accused of passing themselves off as medical clinics offering abortion services. The group, Planned Parenthood of San Diego and Riverside Counties, said the lawsuit was filed after a woman identified only as Jane Roe referred in September to the "clinics" section of a telephone directory and found the Center for Unplanned Pregnancy.

headline.main: Lawsuit Calls 4 Groups Bogus Abortion Clinics

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: PLANNED PARENTHOOD OF SAN DIEGO AND RIVERSIDE COUNTIES
